en.title: StarTimes Video Downloader & Merger Tool V1.0.0 Beta
en.error_m3u8_url_prefix: Error: The M3U8 URL must start with http:// or https://
en.cookie_prompt: Please enter the Cookie value (leave blank if none):
en.warning_no_cookie: Warning: No Cookie value provided, protected content may not be downloadable.
en.star_init_data_not_found: STAR-INIT-DATA not found in M3U8 file
en.no_segments_found: No segment files found in M3U8 file
en.download_progress: Downloading: {completed}/{total} ({percent:.2f}%) | Failed: {failed} | Elapsed: {elapsed:.2f} min | ETA: {eta:.2f} min
en.combining_segments: Combining segments using pure Python binary concatenation...
en.combine_failed_py_binary: Failed to combine segments (Python binary method): {error}
en.combine_failed_py_binary_generic: An unexpected error occurred during segment combining (Python binary method): {error}
en.file_access_issue_suggestion: - Check if the script has write permissions to the output directory.
en.find_video_in_current_dir: You can find the complete video file in the current directory.
en.cleanup_prompt: Do you want to clean up all intermediate files (segments, init.mp4, downloads folder)? [y/N]:
en.cleanup_complete: Cleanup complete! Deleted: {deleted} files and directories.
en.cleanup_complete_message: All intermediate files have been cleaned up, only the merged video file remains.
en.cleanup_skipped_message: All intermediate files have been kept, you can use them to re-execute the merge process.
en.combine_process_error: An error occurred during the merge process!
en.choose_language: Choose language (1 for English, 2 for Chinese):
en.headers_saved_to_config: Default headers saved to config.json for future use (excluding Cookie).
en.headers_info_prompt: You can modify these headers in config.json if needed.
en.content_key_id_not_found: Content Key ID (KID) not found in PSSH data.
en.key_decryption_failed: Key decryption failed. This content might be DRM protected.
en.drm_hint: For DRM protected content, you typically need a license server to get the decryption key.
en.no_encrypted_key_or_pssh: No encrypted key or PSSH data found for DRM processing.

zh.title: StarTimes 视频下载与合并工具 V1.0.0 Beta
zh.error_m3u8_url_prefix: 错误：M3U8 地址必须以 http:// 或 https:// 开头
zh.cookie_prompt: 请输入 Cookie 值 (如果没有，请留空):
zh.warning_no_cookie: 警告：未提供 Cookie 值，受保护的内容可能无法下载。
zh.downloading_m3u8: 正在下载 M3U8 文件: {m3u8_url}
zh.m3u8_download_success: M3U8 文件下载成功 ({length} 字节)
zh.star_init_data_found_map: 在 EXT-X-MAP 标签中找到 STAR-INIT-DATA: {data}...
zh.star_init_data_not_found: M3U8 文件中未找到 STAR-INIT-DATA
zh.no_segments_found: M3U8 文件中未找到分段文件
zh.download_progress: 下载进度: {completed}/{total} ({percent:.2f}%) | 失败: {failed} | 已用时: {elapsed:.2f} 分钟 | 预计剩余: {eta:.2f} 分钟
zh.download_summary: 下载完成。总计: {total}, 完成: {completed}, 失败: {failed}
zh.combining_segments: 正在使用纯 Python 二进制合并分段...
zh.combine_failed_py_binary: 合并分段失败（Python 二进制方法）: {error}
zh.combine_failed_py_binary_generic: 合并分段时发生意外错误（Python 二进制方法）: {error}
zh.no_segments_to_combine: 没有找到可合并的分段。
zh.file_access_issue_suggestion: - 检查脚本是否对输出目录有写入权限。
zh.file_size: 文件大小: {size:,} 字节 ({mb:.2f} MB)
zh.find_video_in_current_dir: 您可以在当前目录找到完整的视频文件。
zh.cleanup_prompt: 是否清理所有中间文件 (分片、init.mp4、downloads 文件夹)？[y/N]:
zh.cleanup_complete: 清理完成！共删除: {deleted} 个文件和目录。
zh.cleanup_complete_message: 所有中间文件已清理完毕，只保留合并后的视频文件。
zh.cleanup_skipped_message: 所有中间文件均已保留，您可以利用它们重新执行合并过程。
zh.choose_language: 选择语言 (1 为英文, 2 为中文):
zh.invalid_language_choice: 无效选择。请输入 1 或 2。
zh.headers_saved_to_config: 默认请求头已保存到 config.json，供将来使用 (不包括 Cookie)。
zh.headers_info_prompt: 如果需要，您可以在 config.json 中修改这些请求头。
zh.content_key_id_found: 内容密钥 ID (KID) 找到: {kid}
zh.content_key_id_not_found: PSSH 数据中未找到内容密钥 ID (KID)。
zh.key_decryption_failed: 密钥解密失败。此内容可能受 DRM 保护。
zh.drm_hint: 对于受 DRM 保护的内容，通常需要许可证服务器来获取解密密钥。
zh.no_encrypted_key_or_pssh: 未找到加密密钥或 PSSH 数据以进行 DRM 处理。
